Package directional

Class Landscape

  • java.lang.Object
    • directional.Landscape
  • public class Landscape
extends java.lang.Object
    Class to hold a Fitness Landscape definition
    Author:
    Sharad Singhal

    • Constructor Detail

      • Landscape

        public Landscape​(int N,
                 int K,
                 Epistasis e,
                 long seed,
                 java.lang.String landscapeFile,
                 boolean findPeaks)
        Create a new Landscape
        Parameters:
        N - - N value for the landscape
        K - - K value for the landscape
        e - - Epistasis type to use
        seed - - seed for the random number generator. If 0, Math.random() is used
        landscapeFile - - landscape file to use. If null, a random landscape is created. If file is given but does not exist, it is created
        findPeaks - - if true, locate all peaks in the landscape

      • Landscape

        public Landscape​(Configuration config)
        Create a landscape from a configuration

      • Landscape

        public Landscape​(Landscape orig,
                 float rho,
                 long seed,
                 java.lang.String landscapeFile)
        Create a landscape correlated with an original landscape
        Parameters:
        orig - - original landscape to use as the template
        rho - - correlation coefficient -1 <= rho <= 1
        seed - - random number seed for this landscape, if any
        landscapeFile - - if given, generated landscape is written to this file

    • Method Detail

      • getFitness

        public float getFitness​(int value)
        Get the value of fitness for a genome for this landscape
        Parameters:
        value - - value of genome to be evaluated
        Returns:
        - fitness value of the genome

      • getMaxPeak

        public float getMaxPeak()
        Get the fitness of the tallest peak in the landscape
        Returns:
        - fitness of the tallest peak. Returns -Float.MAXVALUE if no peaks are available

      • getMinPeak

        public float getMinPeak()
        get the fitness of the smallest peak in the landscape
        Returns:
        - fitness of the smallest peak. Returns Float.MAXVALUE if no peaks are available.

      • getNumberOfPeaks

        public int getNumberOfPeaks()
        Get the number of peaks in the landscape
        Returns:
        - number of peaks in the landscape

      • getPeaks

        public java.util.HashMap<java.lang.Integer,​java.lang.Float> getPeaks()
        Get all peaks available for this landscape
        Returns:
        - Map containing genome

      • writeLandscape

        public void writeLandscape​(java.lang.String fileName)
        Write out the landscape values to a file

      • readLandscape

        public boolean readLandscape()
        Read the population values from a file
        Returns:
        - true if successful, false if read failed

      • main

        public static void main​(java.lang.String[] args)
        Main program to (re) generate a landscape file
        Parameters:
        args - -n N - value of N in the N,K model
        -k K - value of K in the N,K model
        -L fileName - name of the landscape file
        -s seed - random number generator seed
        -e [random | adjacent] - epistasis type
        -f [true | false] - locate fitness peaks if true
